trapomino

Class HighScores

  • java.lang.Object
    • trapomino.HighScores

  • public class HighScores
extends java.lang.Object
    This class renders the Entities that are part of the HighScores frame linked to the InfiniteMenu.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HighScores.Score
      This class stores and compares the scores.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Entity background 
      static Entity mainMenuButton 
      static Entity scoreBoard 
      static java.util.ArrayList<HighScores.Score> scores 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HighScores()
      This constructor loads the scores from the highScores.txt file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addScore(int score, java.lang.String date)
      This method adds the given score to the ArrayList of scores, sorts the ArrayList in descending order, then writes the scores to highScores.txt.
      void loadScores()
      This method reads the scores from the highScores.txt file to the ArrayList scores so they can be rendered.
      static void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This method renders the background of the frame, the buttons to return to the MainMenu, the scoreboard, and the recorded scores.
      void run()
      This method checks to see if the user has clicked the button to change to return to the InfiniteMenu, if that is the case, it plays a sound and changes the state to the InfiniteMenu.
      void writeScores()
      This method writes the ArrayList scores to highScores.txt so it can be saved and read from.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • background

        public static Entity background

      • scoreBoard

        public static Entity scoreBoard

      • mainMenuButton

        public static Entity mainMenuButton

      • scores

        public static java.util.ArrayList<HighScores.Score> scores

    • Constructor Detail

      • HighScores

        public HighScores()
        This constructor loads the scores from the highScores.txt file.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public static void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This method renders the background of the frame, the buttons to return to the MainMenu, the scoreboard, and the recorded scores.
        Parameters:
        g - - the Graphics class used to draw with

      • run

        public void run()
        This method checks to see if the user has clicked the button to change to return to the InfiniteMenu, if that is the case, it plays a sound and changes the state to the InfiniteMenu.

      • addScore

        public void addScore(int score,
                     java.lang.String date)
        This method adds the given score to the ArrayList of scores, sorts the ArrayList in descending order, then writes the scores to highScores.txt.
        Parameters:
        score - - the new score to add
        date - - the date the score was set

      • loadScores

        public void loadScores()
        This method reads the scores from the highScores.txt file to the ArrayList scores so they can be rendered. If the method encounters an error it will log it in the ErrorHandle.

      • writeScores

        public void writeScores()
        This method writes the ArrayList scores to highScores.txt so it can be saved and read from. If the method encounters an error it will log it in the ErrorHandle.
